name: followshows
overview:
Followshows makes it easy to track episodes and get notified when new episodes air.

Followshows has the following features:

  • Track your favorite shows. Tracker is an overview of your favorite shows. Last watched, previously aired, next on TV, everything is here before your eyes.
  • Receive a daily email digest: what aired yesterday, what airs today, what will air tomorrow.
  • All recent episodes of your favorite shows are listed on the queue page. Mark the episodes you’ve watched.
  • Personalized RSS feed with your favorite shows, updated when new episodes air.
  • Get a quick look at what’s on-air this week and next week on the calendar page.
  • Import the calendar in your favorite calendar application (Google Calendar, Outlook, etc.)
  • See TV shows your friends follow and episodes they watch.
  • Mobile apps are in the works!
